title: Styx
plot: "Styx" depicts the transformation of a strong woman torn from her contented world during a sailing trip. When she becomes the only person to come to the aid of a group of refugees shipwrecked on the high seas, she is shown the limits of her importance and of the empathy of her cultural milieu. She is left slipping impotently from one nightmare to the next, and by the end she is forced to recognize that there is no way to counter the cruelties of real life. Only chance can save her.
stars: Susanne Wolff, Gedion Oduor Wekesa, Kelvin Mutuku Ndinda, Inga Birkenfeld

plotShort.plainText:
Styx (film)
Styx is a 2018 German-Austrian drama film directed by Wolfgang Fischer. It was screened in the Panorama section at the 68th Berlin International Film Festival.

Styx (film)

Styx is a 2018 German-Austrian drama film directed by Wolfgang Fischer. It was screened in the Panorama section at the 68th Berlin International Film Festival.

plotFull.plainText:
Styx (film)
Styx is a 2018 German-Austrian drama film directed by Wolfgang Fischer. It was screened in the Panorama section at the 68th Berlin International Film Festival.
Cast
Susanne Wolff as Rieke
Gedion Wekesa Oduor as Kingsley
Alexander Beyer as Paul
Inga Birkenfeld as Marie
Reception
Critical response
On review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, the film holds an approval rating of 95% based on 19 reviews, with an average rating of 7.69/10.
plotFull.html:
Styx (film)

Styx is a 2018 German-Austrian drama film directed by Wolfgang Fischer. It was screened in the Panorama section at the 68th Berlin International Film Festival.


Cast

  • Susanne Wolff as Rieke
  • Gedion Wekesa Oduor as Kingsley
  • Alexander Beyer as Paul
  • Inga Birkenfeld as Marie

Reception

Critical response

On review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, the film holds an approval rating of 95% based on 19 reviews, with an average rating of 7.69/10.

keywords: car crash,monkey,sailboat,female doctor,woman alone at sea

similars.title: What You Don't See
similars.plot: This impressive psychological thriller about a sensitive German adolescent grappling with his father's suicide and his mother's new boyfriend plays out against the eerie woods and fantastic rock formations of the Brittany Coast.
similars.stars: Ludwig Trepte, Frederick Lau, Alice Dwyer

similars.title: Woman at War
similars.plot: Halla becomes a determined environmental activist, but this threatens a long-held hope of hers.
similars.stars: Halldóra Geirharðsdóttir, Jóhann Sigurðarson, Juan Camillo Roman Estrada

similars.title: Birds of Passage
similars.plot: During the marijuana bonanza, a violent decade that saw the origins of drug trafficking in Colombia, Rapayet and his indigenous family get involved in a war to control the business that ends up destroying their lives and their culture.
similars.stars: Carmiña Martínez, José Acosta, Natalia Reyes

similars.title: Arctic
similars.plot: A man stranded in the Arctic after a plane crash must decide whether to remain in the relative safety of his makeshift camp or to embark on a deadly trek through the unknown.
similars.stars: Mads Mikkelsen, Maria Thelma Smáradóttir, Tintrinai Thikhasuk

similars.title: Transit
similars.plot: A man attempting to escape occupied France falls in love with the wife of a dead author whose identity he has assumed.
similars.stars: Franz Rogowski, Paula Beer, Godehard Giese

similars.title: The Mustang
similars.plot: The story of Roman Coleman, a violent convict, who is given the chance to participate in a rehabilitation therapy program involving the training of wild mustangs.
similars.stars: Matthias Schoenaerts, Jason Mitchell, Bruce Dern

similars.title: Gloria Bell
similars.plot: A free-spirited woman in her 50s seeks out love at L.A. dance clubs.
similars.stars: Julianne Moore, John Turturro, Caren Pistorius

similars.title: Never Look Away
similars.plot: German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the DDR-regime.
similars.stars: Tom Schilling, Sebastian Koch, Paula Beer

similars.title: Ray & Liz
similars.plot: Photographer Richard Billingham returns to the squalid council flat outside of Birmingham where he and his brother were raised, in a confrontation and reconciliation with parents Ray and Liz.
similars.stars: Richard Ashton, Jamie-Lee Beacher, Michelle Bonnard

similars.plot: A story of violent love within a time frame spanning from 2001 to 2017.

similars.title: Donbass
similars.plot: In eastern Ukraine, society begins to degrade as the effects of propaganda and manipulation begin to surface in this post-truth era.
